it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons

Interface Attack


  • public interface Attack
    This interface schematizes an attack, which is the effect that a weapon has on one or more targets

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Attack.TargetType
      This enum differentiates the possible type of targets of an attack

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Damageable> execute(Player attacker, java.util.Map<Attack.TargetType,java.util.List<Damageable>> targets)
      This method strikes the attack and returns the damageables this attack was dealt on
      java.util.List<Coin> getCost()
      This method returns the cost of the attack
      java.lang.String getName()
      This method returns a String representing the name of the Attack The name is a Unique Identifier for the attack and must be used to implement hashCode and equals in classes which implement this interface
      Attack.TargetType getSupportedTargetTypes() 
      java.util.List<java.util.List<Damageable>> getTargets(Attack.TargetType type)
      This method returns a list of list of Damageable that the attack can target in one shot

    • Method Detail

      • getTargets

        java.util.List<java.util.List<Damageable>> getTargets(Attack.TargetType type)
        This method returns a list of list of Damageable that the attack can target in one shot
        Parameters:
        type - the type of target which is to be attacked
        Returns:
        a list of the groups of targets that can be attacked, which will be empty if none are available

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        This method returns a String representing the name of the Attack The name is a Unique Identifier for the attack and must be used to implement hashCode and equals in classes which implement this interface
        Returns:
        the name of the attack

      • getCost

        java.util.List<Coin> getCost()
        This method returns the cost of the attack
        Returns:
        the cost that shall be paid to use this attack, the list will be empty if the attack is free

      • execute

        java.util.List<Damageable> execute(Player attacker,
                                   java.util.Map<Attack.TargetType,java.util.List<Damageable>> targets)
        This method strikes the attack and returns the damageables this attack was dealt on
        Parameters:
        attacker - the player who is executing the attack
        targets - a Map associating target types to a list of damageable needed to determine the effect
        Returns:
        the list of Damageable affected by this attack, the list will be empty if no one was affected

      • getSupportedTargetTypes

        Attack.TargetType getSupportedTargetTypes()
